Title: Fatwa against Hafiz Saeed, declaring him anti-Islamic
Content:
The Islamic seminary of Barelvi sect today issued a ‘fatwa’ (edict) against Mumbai terror attacks mastermind Hafiz Saeed declaring him anti-Islamic.
The ‘fatwa’ was issued against the Jamaat-ud-Daw
Author: PTI
Description:
The Islamic seminary of Barelvi sect today issued a ‘fatwa’ (edict) against Mumbai terror attacks mastermind Hafiz Saeed declaring him anti-Islamic.
The ‘fatwa’ was issued against the Jamaat-ud-Daw
